title: Can I quit my job after my husband's Chapter 13 is confirmed?
question: I am on SSDI and have been trying to work part time. It is very stressful on me as well as my family. My daughter is suffering terrible. My husband's chapter 13 was just confirmed. He is expecting a raise at work sometime in the next month or two. Once he receives his raise, can I quit my job to take care of my health and my family, as long as we can continue to make our payments to the trustee?
answers: The answer to this question would require an analysis of the court order and confirmation.
